Title: Relates to restricting the use of electronic monitoring and automated employment decision tools
Summary: Restricts the use by an employer or an employment agency of electronic monitoring or an automated employment decision tool to screen a candidate or employee for an employment decision unless such tool has been the subject of an impact assessment within the last year; requires notice to employment candidates of the use of such tools; provides remedies for violations.
LawCode: Add Art 37 §§1050 - 1057, Lab L; ren §52-c to be §52-e, amd §52-e, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to restricting the use of electronic monitoring and automated employment decision tools; and to amend the civil rights law, in relation to making a conforming change
